variable.name: BIPOLAR_SUBJECT
variable.description: Affection status of African Americans, subjects with European Ancestry, and pedigree of DIGS2 and DIGS3 subjects with European Ancestry. Case=bipolar 1 or schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type with best estimated diagnosis confidence equal to 3 or 4; other=bipolar case alternative diagnosis [bipolar 1 (BP1) or schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type (SABP) with best estimated diagnosis confidence equal to 1 or 2, or all other diagnosis not equal to BP1 or SABP]; control = mentally healthy subjects

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects.

variable.name: GAIN_ID
variable.description: Subject ID. African Americans, subjects with European Ancestry, and pedigree of DIGS2 and DIGS3 subjects with European Ancestry
